comments.body: outside of the scope of this PR but SplitYAMLDocuments needs to be renamed to reflect that it supports JSON too and possibly be moved either in component-base or api-machinery for wider consumption.
Ok maybe I can do this in a follow-up PR?
you can bring this in a WG component-standard meeting for discussion if you like.
I don't think this func is strictly necessary as `| indent 4` should be possible with the Go template syntax
I'm ok with this in the meantime, but we should probably make this more generic later in v1.10
